description: Details required by conditions 3 (a) samples of materials to be used on the external faces of Block 2; (b) samples of materials and detailed drawings of the fenestration, balustrades, and framing to Block 2; (c) samples of materials and detailed drawings of the penthouse floors to Block 2; and (d) details and drawings of the interface treatment for Block 2), and Condition 4 (b) samples of materials and detailed drawings of the fenestration, balustrades, and framing to Block 4; (c) samples of materials and detailed drawings of the penthouse floors to Block 4; (d) details and drawings of the interface treatment for Block 4), and Condition 5 (b) samples of materials and detailed drawings of the fenestration, balustrades, and framing to Block 5; (c) samples of materials and detailed drawings of the penthouse floors to Block 5; (d) details and drawings of the interface treatment for Block 5), of planning permission 19/05637 (Variation of condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings), 3e (block 2*), 4e (block 4*) and 5e (block 5*) - (*details of all soft landscaping on balconies and amenity areas) of planning permission 19/03059 to revise the unit mix of blocks 4 and 5, to amend the internal partitioning between units at levels 0 to 10 of block 2, to amend incorrect elevational drawings and to remove several conditions (Major application))
